html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-02802012-03-08,  ,  ,  FIN,  , 
ActYukon Act
SubjectBorrowing Limit - Yukon
PrecisOrder (a) repealing Order in Council P.C. 2009-595 of April 23, 2009; (b) approving the borrowing of money from time to time, by the Commissioner of YUKON, on behalf of the Government of YUKON, for territorial, municipal or local purposes, provided that the aggregate, from all sources, of all borrowed principal amounts outstanding and accrued interest, does not exceed the sum of $400 million.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Borrowing Limit - Yukon
precis: Order (a) repealing Order in Council P.C. 2009-595 of April 23, 2009; (b) approving the borrowing of money from time to time, by the Commissioner of YUKON, on behalf of the Government of YUKON, for territorial, municipal or local purposes, provided that the aggregate, from all sources, of all borrowed principal amounts outstanding and accrued interest, does not exceed the sum of $400 million.
